trans-unit.source: A deposit at notice is an investment or borrowing without defined due dates. The deposit at notice therefore not only includes the functions available in the fixed-term deposit area, but also a function for giving notice. In other words, in addition to entering the amounts and conditions, you enter the notice period and the interest payment date and frequency. The <sap-technical-name>52B</sap-technical-name><uicontrol>Deposit at Notice(variable)</uicontrol> product type is based on product category <sap-technical-name>550</sap-technical-name><uicontrol>Interest Rate Instrument</uicontrol>, which has the term category <uicontrol>At Notice</uicontrol> and allows you to enter interest conditions of the types <uicontrol>Fixed</uicontrol>, <uicontrol>Variable</uicontrol>, <uicontrol>Scaled (Incremental)</uicontrol>, and <uicontrol>Scaled (Interval)</uicontrol>.

seg-source.mrk: A deposit at notice is an investment or borrowing without defined due dates.
The deposit at notice therefore not only includes the functions available in the fixed-term deposit area, but also a function for giving notice.
In other words, in addition to entering the amounts and conditions, you enter the notice period and the interest payment date and frequency.

The <sap-technical-name>52B</sap-technical-name><uicontrol>Deposit at Notice(variable)</uicontrol> product type is based on product category <sap-technical-name>550</sap-technical-name><uicontrol>Interest Rate Instrument</uicontrol>, which has the term category <uicontrol>At Notice</uicontrol> and allows you to enter interest conditions of the types <uicontrol>Fixed</uicontrol>, <uicontrol>Variable</uicontrol>, <uicontrol>Scaled (Incremental)</uicontrol>, and <uicontrol>Scaled (Interval)</uicontrol>.

target.mrk: 由於即期存款為沒有定義到期日的投資或借款，
因此其不但包含定期存款範圍中的功能，也包含發出通知的功能，
意即，除了輸入金額和條件以外，您可輸入通知期間，以及利息支付日期和頻率。

產品類型 <sap-technical-name>52B</sap-technical-name><uicontrol>[即期存款 (浮動)]</uicontrol> 是以產品種類 <sap-technical-name>550</sap-technical-name><uicontrol>[利率工具]</uicontrol> 為基礎，其期間種類為 <uicontrol>[即期]</uicontrol> 並可讓您輸入類型為 <uicontrol>[固定]</uicontrol>、<uicontrol>[浮動]</uicontrol>、<uicontrol>[分級〈增量〉]</uicontrol> 和 <uicontrol>[分級〈間隔〉]</uicontrol> 的利息條件。
